menu.item-veg-description: A classic Bengali style curry with cauliflower, potato and green peas cooked together in warm spices served with 2 chapati + side salad + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Flavourful chicken curry cooked with spinach and warm spices served with 2 parathas + papad + side salad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Chickpeas cooked in spicy, tangy flavours served with 2 batura/parathas + achar + picked onions
menu.item-nonveg-description: Egg curry cooked in warm spicy freshly ground spices and coconut served with 2 parathas + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: A delicacy from Kerala. Steamed rice flour layered with fresh grated coconut served with spicy flavourful black gram curry + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A delicacy of Goa. Stir-fried prawns added to pickled curry sauce that make your taste buds tingle. Served with 1 paratha + rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in thick onion tomato based creamy buttery gravy with warm spices served with 2 parathas + papad + side salad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Spicy sea baas curry with delicious tangy and sour flavours cooked in comforing coconut milk and spices served with rice + achar + papad + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Mix veggies cooked with aromatic basmati rice and whole spices topped with nuts and rasins served with yogurt dip + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A rich rice dish with soft succulent chicken pieces and aromatic spices, fried onions made with fragrant basmati rice. One of my signature dishes worth dying for! Served with papad + yogurt dip + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Rich and delicious mix vegetables cooked in thick onion & cashew based gravy served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Succulent lamb slow cooked in loads of onion and flavourful spices. Definitely a dish to try. Served with rice + 2 parathas + achar + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Shallow fried onion cooked in spicy flavourful tangy yogurt & cashew based gravy served with 2 paratahs + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A delicacy of Manglore. Chicken pieces cooked in ghee and warm spices served with 2 parathas + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Mix of veggies cooked in freshly roasted kolapuri spices with onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Soft chicken pieces cooked in freshly ground Manglorean spices. A warm and comforting meal served with rice + papad + achar + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Grilled Indian cottage cheese cooked in warm flavourful onion & tomato based thick gravy served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A delicacy of Goa. A spicy, sour fish curry cooked in onion, tomato and tamrind based gravy served with rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Veggies stir fried in ghee topped with tangy tomato puree and topped with cream and served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Tender minced lamb cooked in warm fragrant spices. Served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: A warm comforting dish from Kerala. Mix vegetable stew made with warm spices and coconut milk served with 2 appams (fermented rice pancakes) + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Chicken stew made in coconut milk with whole spices. A delicacy of Kerala served with 2 appams (fermented rice pancakes) + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Spicy, warm and flavourful potato and chickpea cooked with aromatic fragmented basmati rice served with yogurt dip + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Egg curry cooked in thick onion, cashew and coconut based gravy with flavourful spices served with 2 parathas + papad + achar
